requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel from 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 290 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
